

```{r, results = "asis"}
rmd <- sapply(
 unique(obs_pred$index$survey),
 function(nm) {
   knitr::knit_expand("one_survey.Rmd", nm = nm)
  }
 )
rmd <- paste(rmd, collapse = "\n")
rendered <- knitr::knit(text = rmd, quiet = TRUE)

cat(rendered, sep = "\n")
```
